scammer_persona.claimed_identity: Woman - successful crypto trader and investment mentor with guaranteed market strategy

impersonation_and_psychology.trust_building_period: Extended period (weeks to months) - dating app connection, WhatsApp migration, multiple video calls, strategy demonstration, trading period

temporal_indicators.scam_duration: Estimated 2-6 months (romance building through exit scam)

extraction_metadata.notes: Classic romance-based Pig Butchering scam with enhanced trust building via multiple video calls. Woman used blended approach: romantic interest + crypto investment mentor. Platform Cypo (eth-cryp.com) showed fake profits growing from $34,000 to $150,000+. Sophisticated withdrawal blocking: tax demand, partial withdrawal allowed ($2,000) to maintain legitimacy, then complete fund lockage. Platform now defunct - exit scam completed. Estimated loss $63,000. Critical gaps: no blockchain tracking data (wallet addresses/hashes), preventing fund tracing. Californian victim. Video call usage more sophisticated than text-only scams, creates stronger legitimacy and emotional connection.
